replies.body:
I DID NOT KNOW THAT SCUTTLES WAS A GIRL

:C

He was my bro....
but which scuttle is a girl? The dragon side or the Baron side? The other could be male and all they want is to be united together but Mid lane cuts them off from their dreams
Why are you making me ship two crabs. Thank you. That was god damn touching.
Bruh how can you not ship {{champion:81}} x{{champion:44}}

People please get your ships right! xD

{{champion:81}} X {{champion:99}} true love <3
{{champion:103}} X {{champion:77}} kindred spirits
{{champion:236}} X {{champion:67}} 2 hearts 1 mission
{{champion:117}} X {{champion:45}} I don't know what she sees in him
{{champion:86}} X {{champion:55}} Romeo and Juliet if they were a general and an assassin (spin to win)
{{champion:59}} X {{champion:114}} a noble couple indeed
{{champion:53}} X {{champion:61}} techno-love <3
{{champion:41}} X {{champion:21}} that ship has sailed
{{champion:31}} X {{champion:421}} yes there is love in the void
{{champion:122}} X {{champion:92}} Oooh... pretty girl
{{champion:119}} X {{champion:92}} I saw her first!
{{champion:23}} X {{champion:22}} Your friends are barbarians!
{{champion:432}} X {{item:3113}} Lalalalalala
{{champion:51}} X {{champion:126}} Does that thing need bullets or what?
{{champion:63}} X {{item:3751}} Fwoosh! aaaaah
{{champion:19}} X {{champion:16}} Can she forgive him????
Get your ships right, it's {{champion:59}}  and {{champion:102}}
Don't worry man. Girls can be bros too. Scuttle will always be the best bro.

poor helmet bro.
All he's don for ya'll, and you're going to demote him just like that?
Apologies Scuttle, you have been demoted to second best bro. The Helmet Brother has sacrificed himself too many times for us.
No need to get "crabby" over it........ (sigh) Damnit Phreaks
So Scuttles is a girl... no wonder she ran from me.
So {{champion:134}} can't throw baron anymore? I guess dignitas doesn't have to worry about picking her anymore given their history of baron throws.
Pure savage{{summoner:14}}
Goodbye {{champion:81}} mid. You will not be missed.

>PROC YOU LIKE A HURRICANE

Thanks Riot. Now I have to go look up the Scorpions on Youtube. I don't even know how many people here get that joke, and that's upsetting.
_**RITO PLEASE**_, on a game I was playing yesterday in the death recap it said a caster minion did 200 true damage to me under the name "BroPassive"
Seems like a pretty bro passive. Shows up, doesn't even tell anyone, but helps secure a kill like "I gotchu bro!"
oh boy, had no idea syndra could pick up baron....gotta try that before patched
Definitely don't agree with the rumble patch, he's already a difficult champion to play with but you learn to handle him. He's not an OP champ, definitely other places you could have looked top lane.

...They didn't nerf him. At all. Or buff him. Just clarity fixes. Does it make sense to be invulnerable, and taking damage? No, no it doesn't. Nor should you be killed by something that you aren't in range of anymore.
{{item:3050}} was an underrated item, how many players will actually get the new version? Another underrated item, {{item:2004}} I barely see anyone who actually buys{{item:2004}}
you´ll see every pro-player abuse it soon. 50%crit is just ridiculous in a coordinated team.
{{champion:157}} Ahem, You mean 100 percent Crit?
Oh my.....this is going to be thing.
As a Yasuo main. I assure you it will be a thing.

> No longer converts basic attack damage into magic damage

Ezreal ruins _everything._ {{item:3070}}{{champion:41}}{{item:3070}}
Riot Why... Why would you do this to our Emperor {{champion:268}}
Your emperor was being picked or banned in almost every competetive match

"Charms and Taunts will lock Scuttles in place instead of making her confused"

scuttles is a WOMAN !!!!!!!!!!!!!!
female*
Did they just buff tham kench? i expected him to be left alone or nerfed if anything.
the change to {{champion:268}}  makes me sad

Zeke's Harbinger is fine but I disagree with the loss of Herald as a trade off for the simple fact that Herald was an AD item and they made this another AP item. Come on rito, it's bad enough that there's not a single AD+Armor item in the game, but to give a second one to the mages? That's just mean. Especially taking away an interesting AD option to make room for it.

P.S. I pretty much only play aram, where Herald is/was a valid option. Very sad to see it go.
They are keeping AD supports from being a thing at all.

yea, http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/preseason-2015-forging-diverse-armory had all been for void. Rioters are just hypocritical about their own design goals/values...they just took out the one item that made ad-comps a playable thing (aswell as ad-supports), screwing diversity big times.

Looks sweeeeet. I just have a couple questions about some things I noticed last patch:


Is taking AoE damage while inside Tahm intended behavior? I was killed by a Singed poison trail after being eaten by a friendly Tahm.

Is the Rylai's bug fixed?
Tahm makes you untargetable, not invulnerable. Singed poison is a DoT. If you got hit by it before being eaten it will still tick off the DoT.
RIP {{champion:268}} :(

Give me this patch.**NOW!!!!!!**
I want the {{champion:41}}update so I can Parrley
And eat the buffed oranges and be so K.
I want the Trial by Fire
So my kill score goes higher
And have the satisfaction of my KDA being admired
**I**
**WANT**
**THIS**
**PATCH**
**NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOW!!!!!**
Rito pls.
"Its my patch and I need it now"
i wish that in death recap, lets say, you died in a 1v1, i wish it would show the champions damage and TOTAL minion damage instead of 2 random minions that did the most damage
I swear to god i will die if the voice actor is captain jack sparrow.
Even if not, we can pressure rito into getting him right right?
Finally. Global objective death timers.
Why does {{champion:4}} need another skin when there are many other champions that need a skin?
random Darius buff... this patch pleases me

If anything, it's also a buff to people playing against him.  It's obnoxious to jump out of his E only to be brought back because it was already cast on you.  Now you can see that and not look dumb by burning a flash.
how would giving Darius vision help the other team? that makes zero sense....
